features.title: Supports multi-factor authentication
features.description: Supports multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all users or federated users. Includes email-based, TOTP, and U2F MFA.

features.title: Supports general IAM settings
features.description:
Configure the following IAM settings:
1. Restrict whether API keys can be created. 
2. Restrict whether service IDs can be created.
 3. Customize session activity and inactivity timeouts. 
4. Customize the expiration time of both access and refresh token. 
5. Set up global shell settings. 
6. Set up public access group.

features.title: Restrict IP address access
features.description:
Restrict IP subnets and IP addresses. 
Supports both 'monitor' and 'restrict' control modes.

profiles.profile_name: IBM Cloud Framework for Financial Services

outputs.description: Current state of public access group setting
Enforcement mode for allowed IP addresses. RESTRICT is returned if account_allowed_ip_addresses_enforced is set to true.
Ignore state of IBM approved IP addresses

Current state of Service ID creation restriction

products.label: IAM account settings
products.long_description:
This module configures standard IAM account settings with recommended values. The default input values are aligned with IBM Cloud Framework for Financial Services, and exports those values as outputs.

With this module, you can create and update settings. For objects that are affected by the Terraform 'destroy' command, the module preserves the most recent settings, and doesn't change objects that are configured outside of the Terraform logic.
products.name: deploy-arch-ibm-account-settings
products.short_description: Configures standard IAM parameters and account settings
